duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through proactive business to business sales efforts.
Identify and prioritize sales opportunities, managing multiple touch points to drive outcomes.
Engage in face-to-face meetings, networking, and portfolio building to promote and sell products/services.
Maintain client relationships to drive future revenue growth and renewals.
Utilize compelling communication skills to bring concepts to life and persistently pursue sales targets.
Participate in critical business discussions to understand and address business owners' needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
